text: Labo phakathi kwenu abenza amakhosikazi abo angabi semthethweni (ngokuwabiza ngokuthi imihlane yawo injengeyonina, lokho babekwenzela isehlukaniso) wona (amakhosikazi abo) akawasibona onina, akuyibona onina ngaphandle kwabesifazane ababazala futhi ngempela bona basho inkulumo embi neyamanga ngempela uMvelinqangi ungoxolelayo othethelelayo
